RulesLabel:
1) you are porcupine
2) cat is your opponent
3) field is full of salami
4) cat wants to get salami
5) you should resist

"attacks" - next attacks directions
"remaining" - seconds until next attack
"round" - current round number
"thorns" - available thorns number

"new" - restart game
"skip" - finish turn ahead of time

- salami click sets thorn
- thorn click removes thorn
